tgt_original: triruccāryaitān śiṣyāñjñātvā yadbhaktivatsalān ||191 ||  prathānaṃ śiṣyamekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyādidaṃ vacaḥ |
ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim |  deśayiṣyāmi te samyag bhājanastvaṃ mahānaye ||192 ||
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||
sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |  tā hi bhaviṣyatha ||209 ||
sārvakarmikaḥ ||212 ||  pṛṣṭvā śubhāśubhaṃ svapnaṃ hatvā kuṇḍalināśubham |  śiṣyānsaṃrakṣya tān yogyānsaṃvaraṃ grāhayettataḥ ||213 ||
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
pratibimbaṃ sphuṭaṃ śiṣyāḥ sarve paśyantvakalmaṣāḥ ||290 ||  sāmānyasaṃvaraṃ śiṣyaṃ prāgvatkāyādibhāsvaram |
na ca tvayedaṃ sarvatathāgataparamarahasyamamaṇḍalapraviṣṭāya vaktavyaṃ na cāśraddhā[ya dā]tavyamiti vācyam |
raktāmbaraṃ tadāsyaṃ ca pṛcchet kastvamiti priya |
yogacittaṃ samutpādya hṛdi vajraṃ hṛdā nyaset ||293 ||
mantraḥ- om sarvayogacittamutpādayāmi surate samayastvaṃ hoḥ sidhya vajra yathāsukham |
